code: import{useState}from"react";import'./ItemCount.css';import'bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItemCount=_ref=>{let{stockDisponible,initial,onAdd}=_ref;const[counter,setCounter]=useState(initial);const handlerDecreaseCount=()=>{if(counter>0)setCounter(counter-1);};const handlerIncreaseCount=()=>{if(stockDisponible>counter)setCounter(counter+1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Button btn-group mb-2",role:"group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Button btn btn-outline-primary",onClick:handlerDecreaseCount,children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"Number",children:counter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Button btn btn-outline-primary",type:"submit",onClick:handlerIncreaseCount,children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:()=>onAdd(counter),disabled:!stockDisponible,children:"Agregar al carrito"})})]});};export default ItemCount;
